EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Pricing on Desktop Technonogy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
OfficeDepot and McDonalds
Great value on monitors & workstations! The many benefits of being an Office Depot® partner include exceptional pricing on three of our best sellers — the Acer® monitor and Ergotron® sit-to-stand workstations. Greater efficiency! Greater comfort! Bottom line — great value! Now through May 1, 2017, get fantastic savings on these popular products
•
Acer® LED Monitor, 18.5" #121186
•
Ergotron® WorkFit-T Desktop Workstation #347951
•
Ergotron® WorkFit-TL Desktop Workstation #887538
Hurry — very limited time offer! Call 630-MCD-SAVE (1-630-623-7283), email marketplace@us.mcd.com or contact your dedicated Account Manager:
Timothy Lebar timothy.lebar@officedepot.com Direct Number: 1-512-651-2871 Toll Free: 1-855-337-6811, Ext. 12871
Gabriel Escobar gabriel.escobar@officedepot.com Direct Number: 1-512-651-2692 Toll Free: 1-855-337-6811, Ext. 12692
For Specialized Tech Solutions:
John Baugnon john.baugnon@officedepot.com Direct Number: 1-512-651-2737 Toll Free: 1-888-707-7040, Ext. 12737
